name: Shakuyaku
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Monkey.D.Luffy] or red Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Monkey.D.Luffy] or red Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
